trans-unit.source: HDInsight article index for Azure portal | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: HDInsight article index for Azure portal | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: An index page with links to articles about HDInsight on the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: An index page with links to articles about HDInsight on the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends the Azure preview portal for new Hadoop clusters on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft recommends the Azure preview portal for new Hadoop clusters on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight article index for the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: HDInsight article index for the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: Use this index page to find articles covering HDInsight on the [Azure portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).
trans-unit.target: Use this index page to find articles covering HDInsight on the [Azure portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/).

trans-unit.source: Azure HDInsight is a cloud distribution of open-source Hadoop and the Hortonworks Data Platform.
trans-unit.target: Azure HDInsight is a cloud distribution of open-source Hadoop and the Hortonworks Data Platform.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] This documentation index page is for customers who already have solutions deployed to the current Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] This documentation index page is for customers who already have solutions deployed to the current Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft recommends using the **Azure preview portal** for new HDInsight clusters:
trans-unit.target: Microsoft recommends using the **Azure preview portal** for new HDInsight clusters:

trans-unit.source: Go to HDInsight preview portal documentation
trans-unit.target: Go to HDInsight preview portal documentation

trans-unit.source: Go to the Azure preview portal
trans-unit.target: Go to the Azure preview portal

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see [DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome](/overview/preview-portal/).
trans-unit.target: For an explanation of the advantages of the preview portal, see [DevOps just got a whole lot more awesome](/overview/preview-portal/).

trans-unit.source: HDInsight on the Azure portal will not receive upgrades after July 2015 and is replaced by the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight on the Azure portal will not receive upgrades after July 2015 and is replaced by the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: Get started
trans-unit.target: Get started

trans-unit.source: If you're new to Hadoop on HDInsight, go to the [HDInsight documentation page](/documentation/services/hdinsight/) to get started with the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: If you're new to Hadoop on HDInsight, go to the [HDInsight documentation page](/documentation/services/hdinsight/) to get started with the Azure preview portal.
